function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Selection of studies with cross-sectional or longitudinal methodology","Impact":"Limited understanding of the mental health impact during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Use additional search strategies to capture diverse study designs","Technologies":"Advanced search algorithms, machine learning for text analysis","People":"Research community, general population","Owner":"Research community, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of specific sub-groups from the study","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of mental health impact on specific populations","Mitigation":"Conduct separate targeted studies for excluded populations","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics for subgroup analysis","People":"Specific sub-groups, research community","Owner":"Research community, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on English, Spanish, French, Italian, or Portuguese studies","Impact":"Limited insights from other language-speaking populations","Mitigation":"Engage translators for multilingual analysis, collaborate with international researchers","Technologies":"Translation tools, cross-language information retrieval systems","People":"Multilingual populations, research community","Owner":"Research community, international organizations"}]}
